settings.notificationsDesc: Get alerts when your teams play
settings.enableNotificationsDesc: Get alerts for your favorite teams

notifications.setupDesc: Get notified when your favorite teams play, plus receive exclusive betting tips and value bets.
notifications.reminderDesc: Set up notifications to get alerts when your favorite teams play. You'll also get the best betting tips!
notifications.noTeamsYet: Search and add your favorite teams above
notifications.addTeamsHint: Add teams to get personalized match alerts
notifications.permissionDenied: Please allow notifications in your browser settings
notifications.successDescWithTeams: We'll notify you about matches for {{count}} team(s) and send you the best betting tips.
notifications.successDesc: You'll receive the best betting tips and match alerts.

promo.heroSubtitle: Place bets with AI predictions at a trusted bookmaker with the best odds
promo.bonusDesc: first deposit bonus for new players
promo.geoWarning: Using alternative link for your region ({{country}})
promo.benefit1Desc: The odds and lines we use in our predictions come from this bookmaker. With another bookmaker, your bets may not match our recommendations.
promo.benefit2Desc: Following our predictions, you will win — often large sums. This bookmaker guarantees payout of big winnings without delays or limits.
promo.benefit3Desc: Higher odds = more profit per bet. This is one of the best odds on the market.
promo.benefit4Desc: Operates under international license. Verified by our team and thousands of AI Betting Bot users.
promo.why1: Our predictions are tied to this bookmaker — odds, lines and recommendations are calculated for their quotes
promo.why2: With another bookmaker your results may differ — different odds and margin can lead to losses even with correct prediction
promo.why3: App statistics will be accurate — your results will fully match our win statistics
promo.step1Desc: Tap the button below — download and install the bookmaker app
promo.step2Desc: Fill in details in a minute, make a deposit and get up to 1500€ bonus
promo.step3Desc: Return to AI Betting Bot, read predictions and bet according to recommendations
promo.ctaSubtext: Free • Bonus up to 1500€ on registration
promo.helpDesc: Our manager will help you through all steps!

proAccess.heroTitle: Unlock PRO access to all features
proAccess.heroSubtitle: Unlimited predictions, advanced tools and full control over your bets
proAccess.limitDesc: Activate PRO to get unlimited access to all app features for 30 days.
proAccess.benefit1Desc: Unlimited AI prediction generation for any match
proAccess.benefit3Desc: Control your bankroll, calculate stakes and manage budget
proAccess.benefit4Desc: AI finds bets with inflated odds
proAccess.benefit5Desc: Full statistics of all your predictions and results
proAccess.step1Desc: Tap the button below and download our verified partner's app
proAccess.step2Desc: Create account and deposit any amount — get up to €1,500 bonus on bets
proAccess.step3Desc: Within 5 minutes after deposit you'll get full access to all features for 30 days
proAccess.bonusDesc: Besides PRO access you'll get welcome bonus from bookmaker on your first deposit
